summary: Do you like Amulet of Mara but you're not interested in same sex marriage? Other NPCs with the same sex won't show interest in you anymore.
descriptionHtml:
...By request, and since I've not found another mod to do this.

To know more about the Amulet of Mara go talk to the priest Maramal in Riften..
Do you like the Amulet of Mara enchantment (Restoration spells cost 10% less to cast) but you're not interested in same sex marriage? Other NPCs with same sex won't show interest in you anymore (as a result you can't marry them). This works for men and women player characters.

Should be compatible with anything since it's a very basic mod: no scripts, no race changes, no factions editing...

Supported languages: ENG, ITA, FR, GER, SPA, POL, RUS, CZ.

[U]Please, install and activate only the mod in your own language![/U]

[B]N.B.: no homophobic or gay-crusade comments will be tolerated. Use comments just to report potential conflicts, bugs, thanks, kudos, etc.[/B]

NEWS: Added POL, RUS, CZ languages and Don't hit on me version: won't get spontaneous comments from opposite sex NPCs, never. You still can marry them of course if you start the dialog.

Be happy, life is short... and this is just a video-game!
author: Hexaae
